mainText:
Welcome to Bank of Entitlement, where your every whim becomes our top priority! Get ready to experience banking like never before.

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, I was at the Bank of Entitlement the other day, expecting the royal treatment as always. I saunter in, my entourage in tow, when suddenly I notice they've run out of gold-plated pens at the teller's desk. Can you believe it? Out of sheer shock, I nearly fainted, but instead, I summoned my most regal voice and demanded to speak with the manager. Within minutes, the entire bank staff was scrambling to find me a fresh batch of pens, apologizing profusely for the oversight. It was a close call, but in the end, I graciously accepted their apologies and felt utterly vindicated in my entitlement. Just another day in the life of a Bank of Entitlement VIP!
